Nokia G21 highlight

Nokia G21 will be launched in February 2022. The G21 launched with model number unknown. Firstly, Its dimensional measure is 164.6 x 75.9 x 8.5 mm and the weight is 190 grams. Secondly, the display of the G21 is a 6.5-inch IPS LCD panel with 720 x 1600 pixels resolution. The display is protected with Corning Gorilla Glass 5. Thirdly and most importantly, It is powered by the Unisoc T606 (12 nm) and running with Android 11. Moreover, it has up to an Octa-core (2×1.6 GHz Cortex-A75 & 6×1.6 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU.

The Nokia G21 phone has a triple-camera setup on the back. This formation consists of a 50MP wide, 2MP depth, and 2 MP camera. It has an 8MP selfie camera inside the notch of the display. That is to say, G21 is 2G/3G/4G supportable. The fingerprint sensor is side-mounted.
